heuristic_example_text: We ask you to come up with sentences that do not use the same noun, verb, adjective, and adverb appearing in the original text (including proper nouns, such as the name of a person or the name of a city). This, however, does not mean that you have to change the function words. In other words -- you can reuse words such as the, can, should, that, at, in, near, and, but, any, he, she, they, is, was, etc.
heuristic_payment_text: Adding this restriction to the maybe correct or definitely incorrect statement will add a bonus of $0.05. Because it's often more challenging to add this restriction to a definitely correct statement, doing so is worth a bonus of $0.10.
